meanings.definition: Without being aware or conscious of a situation or fact.
meanings.sent1: She walked unawares into the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: He was reading so intently that he was taken unawares by the sudden noise.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit disappear unawares, leaving the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: The news of the unexpected promotion hit her unawares, like a bolt from the blue.
meanings.sent5: The thief crept up unawares, silent as a shadow.

meanings.definition: Caught off guard or surprised by something.
meanings.sent1: The unawares hiker stumbled upon a hidden waterfall.
meanings.sent2: She had an unawares expression when the surprise fireworks lit up the sky.
meanings.sent3: The unawares puppy barked at its own reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: His unawares reaction to the prank made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent5: The unawares student received a perfect score on the test, shocking everyone.
